_header: Lord that givest us many things
_description: A prayer for benefactors and the souls of the faithful — two stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
Lorde þat ȝeuest us many þingesRewarde to al oure
                    benefactours…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…And sey gracias þere byfore þe Amen lorde amen so
                    mote hit be
BodRawB408.Editions:
Clark,  Andrew,
                        ed.  
             The English Register of Godstow Nunnery… c. 1450.
             3 vols. 
             EETS
         o. s. 129 (1905; repr. 1971); 130 (1906; repr. with 142, 1971); 142
